alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 9:58PM CST until March 08 at 6:20PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Steelville. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River at Valley Park. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Pacific. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Route N begins to flood. At 17.0 feet, State Highway AK begins flooding near the intersection with State Highway O near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 8.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday morning to a crest of 19.0 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Pacific 15.0 8.4 14.7 18.9 16.8 9.4 4.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
